answers.answer: They're constantly checking for preeclampsia with your blood pressure and weight gain and swollenness. I had protein and dehydration too, turned out it was nothing but if you're concerned about preeclampsia let your doctor know they will monitor you (:
I've already gained 24lbs and have swelled feet and ankles but my bp is good

question: When do they check for preeclampsia? What are the early signs of having it?The dr said ive had protein in my urine ever since I hit 12 weeks and at 23 weeks there was protein and I was 50% dehydrated
title: preeclampsia?
